name: BodyBuilders
description:
Introducing BodyBuilders!

The only company that offers fully functional bodies to help you take on the world!

Gone are the days of being limited by your own physical abilities. Our team of expert technicians and mad scientists work tirelessly to transform donated corpses into fully functioning bodies that you can purchase to assist you in any task. Need to lift heavy boxes? No problem. Want to run a marathon? Easy peasy.

Our bodies are designed to help you take on any challenge that comes your way. They come fully equipped with all the necessary organs, muscles, and bones, so you can focus on the task at hand without worrying about physical limitations.

So why wait? Join the BodyBuilders family today and start tackling your to-do list with ease. Who needs a gym membership when you can have a BodyBuilders body to do the heavy lifting for you?

Controls
  • W-A-S-D -> Move
  • Mouse -> Aim
  • E / Left Click  -> Interact

You can rebind your controls on the pause menu.

Credits

Maxime  "Vylozeny" Fieffé -> Programming / Sound Design / UI

Loïc  "MetalFox Dioxymore" Parra -> Programming / Music / Level Design / Ugly 3D Modeling

Assets

Quaternius: Awesome 3D modeling
Mixamo: Animations
Jean Moreno: Visual FX
game-icons.net: Icons
Robotic Attack Fonts: Font

Original Soundtrack
